CustomField.description: Formula based on Customer Invoice Amount / Image Count. Price Per Image is important industry standard which we can use to determine if pricing is within industry standards. Customers request to estimate based on price per image v full amount
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula based on Customer Invoice Amount / Image Count. Price Per Image is important industry standard which we can use to determine if pricing is within industry standards. Customers request to estimate based on price per image v full amount
CustomField.label: zAmount - Price Per Image
